text: St. Gabriel's Sr. Sec. School was established on 6 July 1959 and is managed by the Montfort Brothers of St. Gabriel. It has classes from Nursery to 12th in English medium. St. Gabriel’s Sr. Sec. School is affiliated to Central Board of Secondary Education, New Delhi under the Affiliation No. 1030259. The institution is established and run by the Christian minority community, mainly meant for the members of the community but open to everyone. Preference will be given to Catholics. Admission is subject to vacancies. St. Gabriel's Sr. Sec. School, Ranjhi, Jabalpur is under the management of the Society of the Montfort Brothers of St. Gabriel, whose headquarter is at Bhopal. ==References== http://www.gabrielsjbp.com/index.php?r=user/aboutus ==External links== * Category:Brothers of Christian Instruction of St Gabriel schools Category:Catholic secondary schools in India Category:Primary schools in India Category:High schools and secondary schools in Madhya Pradesh Category:Christian schools in Madhya Pradesh Category:Education in Jabalpur Category:Educational institutions established in 1959 Category:1959 establishments in India
title: St. Gabriel's Senior Secondary School, Jabalpur
